import React from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import logo from "../../assets/logo.png"; import "../../styles/dashboard.css"; const StudentDashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = () => { // Remove user data if needed localStorage.removeItem("user"); navigate("/"); // Redirect to landing page }; return (
